title: Unable to run `zk init`
body:
Hi, I have installed all the dependencies followed `setup-dev.md`, however, when I run `zk init`, errors occur. 
The commit ID is `30cf7617a`.

My system is Mac OS 10.15.7, and rustc version is stable 1.48 and 1.50, and also I have tried nightly 1.52.

```
DATABASE_URL = postgres://postgres@localhost/plasma
   Compiling zksync_storage v1.0.0 (zksync/core/lib/storage)
error: unsupported type action_type for param #1
   --> core/lib/storage/src/chain/block/mod.rs:651:21
    |
651 |           let count = sqlx::query!(
    |  _____________________^
652 | |             r#"SELECT count(*) as "count!" FROM operations WHERE action_type = $1 AND confirmed = $2"#,
653 | |             action_type.to_string(),
654 | |             is_confirmed
655 | |         )
    | |_________^
    |
    = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error: unsupported type action_type for param #1
  --> core/lib/storage/src/chain/operations/mod.rs:34:25
   |
34 |           let max_block = sqlx::query!(
   |  _________________________^
35 | |             r#"SELECT max(block_number) FROM operations WHERE action_type = $1 AND confirmed IS DISTINCT FROM $2"#,
36 | |             action_type.to_string(),
37 | |             confirmed.map(|value| !value)
38 | |         )
   | |_________^
   |
   = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error: unsupported type action_type for param #2
  --> core/lib/storage/src/chain/operations/mod.rs:59:22
   |
59 |           let result = sqlx::query_as!(
   |  ______________________^
60 | |             StoredOperation,
61 | |             "SELECT * FROM operations WHERE block_number = $1 AND action_type = $2",
62 | |             i64::from(block_number),
63 | |             action_type.to_string()
64 | |         )
   | |_________^
   |
   = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error: unsupported type action_type for param #2
   --> core/lib/storage/src/chain/operations/mod.rs:142:18
    |
142 |           let op = sqlx::query_as!(
    |  __________________^
143 | |             StoredOperation,
144 | |             "INSERT INTO operations (block_number, action_type) VALUES ($1, $2)
145 | |             RETURNING *",
146 | |             operation.block_number,
147 | |             operation.action_type
148 | |         )
    | |_________^
    |
    = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error: unsupported type action_type for param #3
   --> core/lib/storage/src/chain/operations/mod.rs:161:9
    |
161 | /         sqlx::query!(
162 | |             "UPDATE operations
163 | |                 SET confirmed = $1
164 | |                 WHERE block_number = $2 AND action_type = $3",
...   |
167 | |             action_type.to_string()
168 | |         )
    | |_________^
    |
    = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error: unsupported type action_type for param #4
   --> core/lib/storage/src/chain/operations/mod.rs:182:9
    |
182 | /         sqlx::query!(
183 | |             "UPDATE operations
184 | |                 SET confirmed = $1
185 | |                 WHERE block_number >= $2 AND block_number <= $3 AND action_type = $4",
...   |
189 | |             action_type.to_string()
190 | |         )
    | |_________^
    |
    = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error: aborting due to 6 previous errors

error: could not compile `zksync_storage`

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.
error: `cargo check` failed with status: exit code: 101
   Compiling zksync_storage v1.0.0 (zksync/core/lib/storage)
error: unsupported type action_type for param #1
   --> core/lib/storage/src/chain/block/mod.rs:651:21
    |
651 |           let count = sqlx::query!(
    |  _____________________^
652 | |             r#"SELECT count(*) as "count!" FROM operations WHERE action_type = $1 AND confirmed = $2"#,
653 | |             action_type.to_string(),
654 | |             is_confirmed
655 | |         )
    | |_________^
    |
    = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error: unsupported type action_type for param #1
  --> core/lib/storage/src/chain/operations/mod.rs:34:25
   |
34 |           let max_block = sqlx::query!(
   |  _________________________^
35 | |             r#"SELECT max(block_number) FROM operations WHERE action_type = $1 AND confirmed IS DISTINCT FROM $2"#,
36 | |             action_type.to_string(),
37 | |             confirmed.map(|value| !value)
38 | |         )
   | |_________^
   |
   = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error: unsupported type action_type for param #2
  --> core/lib/storage/src/chain/operations/mod.rs:59:22
   |
59 |           let result = sqlx::query_as!(
   |  ______________________^
60 | |             StoredOperation,
61 | |             "SELECT * FROM operations WHERE block_number = $1 AND action_type = $2",
62 | |             i64::from(block_number),
63 | |             action_type.to_string()
64 | |         )
   | |_________^
   |
   = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error: unsupported type action_type for param #2
   --> core/lib/storage/src/chain/operations/mod.rs:142:18
    |
142 |           let op = sqlx::query_as!(
    |  __________________^
143 | |             StoredOperation,
144 | |             "INSERT INTO operations (block_number, action_type) VALUES ($1, $2)
145 | |             RETURNING *",
146 | |             operation.block_number,
147 | |             operation.action_type
148 | |         )
    | |_________^
    |
    = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error: unsupported type action_type for param #3
   --> core/lib/storage/src/chain/operations/mod.rs:161:9
    |
161 | /         sqlx::query!(
162 | |             "UPDATE operations
163 | |                 SET confirmed = $1
164 | |                 WHERE block_number = $2 AND action_type = $3",
...   |
167 | |             action_type.to_string()
168 | |         )
    | |_________^
    |
    = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error: unsupported type action_type for param #4
   --> core/lib/storage/src/chain/operations/mod.rs:182:9
    |
182 | /         sqlx::query!(
183 | |             "UPDATE operations
184 | |                 SET confirmed = $1
185 | |                 WHERE block_number >= $2 AND block_number <= $3 AND action_type = $4",
...   |
189 | |             action_type.to_string()
190 | |         )
    | |_________^
    |
    = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)

error: aborting due to 6 previous errors

error: could not compile `zksync_storage`

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.

Error: Child process exited with code 1
```
